biotools.summary: MetaQTL is a Java package designed to perform the integration of data from the field of gene mapping experiments (e.g molecular markers, QTL, candidate genes, etc…). This package consists in a modular library and several programs written in pure Java. These programs can perform various tasks, including formatting, analyzing and visualizing data or results produced by MetaQTL.
